bio:
I am certified SEO Expert with TOP Ranking SEO expert on a well reputed Free lance website. My main strengths are to generate quality results, increase traffic, ROI and Page Rank of the website with white hat techniques.

I worked on Joomla, Wordpress, CMS and PHP sites to perform on-page and off-page optimization to drive quality results. I am using professional tools to track quality reporting from starting to End of the project. I am using SEOMOZ, Link Assistant, Market Samurai for my clients.

I had crunched expertise of Onpage optimization, Off Page Optimization, One way / Two way and three-way link building (Social Sites, Blogs, Articles, Directories) , Link Exchange, Email Marketing, Adwords, PPC / CPC Marketing, Facebook, Social Marketing, Adsense, Google Base, Shopzilla, G. Analytic & Urchin 4, 5. I do write Blogs and Articles for my client.
24/7 availability on Skype and Gtalk

bio: I am a professional engineer (license number AL30968) with a broad background in multiple fields including traditional mechanical and electrical engineering.  I have a Ph.D. in aeronautical engineering and I have worked as an industrial R&D engineer, naval engineer, and government aerospace research engineer.  I currently teach engineering part time but my hobby is consumer product and private R&D design work.  I specialize in design analysis and  prototype of new concepts.

I can devote up to 25 hours/week to new product R&D.  My rate is $50/hour for analysis and design work.  Most projects can be reviewed in about and hour to check to make sure that that we aren't going to break any of the laws of physics and verify the producibillity of the concept.
For start-ups with really cool ideas that I would enjoy working on, I am willing to come onboard as a minor partner for about 2.5% interest.

bio:
am Nivas, a freelance Digital Designer with a Masters degree in IT from Coventry University. My long term goal is to help the startup businesses across the globe with a strong digital marketing strategy to give them a strong and equal online presence. 

Been working sitting at one place in the UK for the past decade and now decided to travel a lot to understand the market situations in different countries and develop a single unique marketing strategy that links all businesses and would help any business across the globe achieve their targets.

 At the moment, in Sri-lanka, working on some investment plans. Next in my list are China, Maldives, Singapore and UAE. I am a full time freelancer, also doing direct contract roles for leading email marketing service providers like MailChimp, HubSpot.

I have worked with small businesses, creative agencies and freelance web designers to deliver powerful websites, HTML emails and applications. 

?Expertise : 

?Websites
?HTML emails
?Logo designs
?Branding
?Word-press
?PHP
?HTML
?CSS

Accreditations:
Registered Mailchimp Email developer assisting Mailchimp customers develop their custom templates and an Approved template developer for a leading Email service Provider in the US.

I have worked with most email providers. Very much comfortable with Mailchimp, Campaign Monitor, dotMailer, Constant Contact, Aweber, Hubspot, Madmini and many others.

?I have got over 12 years’ professional experience in marketing, design and web development. And that means you’ll get a blend of skills delivering a product that will work harder to generate business.

?A long term user of PPH with over 700 positive reviews. 

?Have successfully completed 600 Jobs.

bio:
Accomplished senior executive with recognized success in sales, sales management, and business development in fast-paced, challenging environments. Keen business acumen, with expertise in defining business strategies and translating them into high-impact actions, profitable internal and external business partnerships, and revenue & profit growth. Resourceful leader and team builder; skilled at leading teams to exceed business objectives. Customer-centered, solutions-focused, and profit-driven. Qualifications enhanced with MBA.
My 20+ years of experience in sales, marketing, and business development in industries as diverse as architecture, telecommunications, retail, and technology give me a unique perspective that can benefit anyone looking to start, turn-around, or refocus a new or existing business. I have started and launched four companies, been a stakeholder in three successful startups, and have worked for some of the most successful companies in the world. Let's talk!
In-person, via Skype or WebEx, or via phone. I can work either hourly, on retainer, or on a project basis.

abstrac: Professional Project Manager / Enterprise Software Architect
bio: Sirrah Development Inc specializes in consulting with our clients in determining if their system is cost effective and in line with the company's budget.  We determine if there need to changes in software, system or hardware by analysis of the business operation and thru conversation with stakeholders in each department effected.  In some cases we come in and manage on going projects that are met to make these changes and other times we are the driving force in developing and designing the changes needed to return the business's ROI to where they want it be.  That includes rebuilding database systems, data warehousing, migration to Cloud system.

Hours of operation from 9am to 5pm Monday thru Friday.  Payment terms, 35 to 40 dollars per hour for Project management contracts up to six months in length.  For contracts in Enterprise Software architecture payment terms increase to 55 to 60 dollars per hour.  Contracts expected to go more then 12 months in length we need a deposit of 2,000 up front and then rate for project per hour begins.  Client will receive a itemized bill every two weeks payment is expected 48 hours after invoice is received by client.  After 48 hours and payment has not been received by Sirrah Development Inc work on project will be postponed.

description.title: Creative Writing
description: After 34+ years as an executive in the Financial Industry, I retired my navy blue suits and red ties and became a successful Published Author, bringing quality proven creative writing expertise to my

abstrac: Quality original writing for quality clients
bio: After 34+ years as an executive, including as CEO, in the Financial Industry and as a successful Published Author, Bill brings high quality proven expertise to his clients. He has helped clients across the U.S., Great Britain, Canada, Europe, Germany, Pakistan, and Sweden achieve major goals - financing, branding, SEO copy, original website and social media copy, tip sites, articles, blogs, newsletters, and e-books. Along with two published books, Bill has also authored thousands of articles and blogs on legal issues, business and personal finance for a wide variety of companies since 2005. Visit my website (http://eaglegroup24.wix.com/personal) to learn more.

I prefer to communicate via e-mail. However, sometimes my clients, because of  project complexity or questions about tone (journalistic, business formal, conversational, expert, etc.) prefer phone discussion. I have flexible payment terms. For domestic clients, PayPal is the most common. Electronic payments seem to work best for most clients. Since so many projects are assigned via e-mail, which without benefit of one-to-one conversation can miss a new client's target, I always willing--and happy--to make revisions to give my clients the exact insight, tone and focus they want.
